obligations.title: Understanding the organization and its context
obligations.description: Determine external and internal issues relevant to ISMS

obligations.title: Understanding needs and expectations of interested parties
obligations.description: Determine interested parties and their requirements

obligations.title: Determining the scope of the ISMS
obligations.description: Define boundaries and applicability of ISMS

obligations.title: Information security management system
obligations.description: Establish, implement, maintain and continually improve ISMS

obligations.title: Leadership and commitment
obligations.description: Top management must demonstrate leadership and commitment

obligations.title: Organizational roles, responsibilities and authorities
obligations.description: Assign and communicate responsibilities and authorities

obligations.title: Risk treatment
obligations.description: Define and apply risk treatment process

obligations.title: Information security objectives
obligations.description: Establish security objectives at relevant functions

obligations.title: Competence
obligations.description: Ensure competence of persons doing work

obligations.title: Awareness
obligations.description: Ensure awareness of information security policy

obligations.title: Information security risk assessment
obligations.description: Perform risk assessments at planned intervals

obligations.title: Internal audit
obligations.description: Conduct internal audits at planned intervals

obligations.title: Continual improvement
obligations.description: Continually improve ISMS suitability and effectiveness

obligations.title: Nonconformity and corrective action
obligations.description: React to nonconformity and take corrective action

obligations.title: Information security roles and responsibilities
obligations.description: All information security responsibilities shall be defined

obligations.title: Management responsibilities
obligations.description: Management shall require compliance with security policies

obligations.title: Terms and conditions of employment
obligations.description: Employment agreements shall include security responsibilities

obligations.title: Information security awareness
obligations.description: Personnel shall receive security awareness training

obligations.title: Physical security perimeter
obligations.description: Security perimeters shall protect areas with information

obligations.title: Physical entry
obligations.description: Secure areas shall be protected by appropriate entry controls

obligations.title: User endpoint devices
obligations.description: Information on endpoint devices shall be protected

obligations.title: Privileged access rights
obligations.description: Allocation of privileged access rights shall be restricted

obligations.title: Information access restriction
obligations.description: Access to information shall be restricted

obligations.title: Access to source code
obligations.description: Read and write access to source code shall be restricted

obligations.title: Secure authentication
obligations.description: Secure authentication technologies shall be implemented

obligations.title: Configuration management
obligations.description: Configurations shall be established and maintained

obligations.title: Information deletion
obligations.description: Information shall be deleted when no longer required

obligations.title: Data masking
obligations.description: Data masking shall be used in accordance with policy

obligations.title: Data leakage prevention
obligations.description: Data leakage prevention measures shall be applied

obligations.title: Understanding the organization and its context
Determining scope of QMS
obligations.description: Define boundaries of quality management system

obligations.title: Quality management system and its processes
Actions to address risks and opportunities
obligations.description: Plan to address risks and opportunities

obligations.title: Resources
obligations.description: Determine and provide resources for QMS

obligations.title: Planning action
obligations.description: Plan actions for aspects and risks
